backend/main.mo: Main actor defining user roles, profiles, stores, products, orders, reviews, terms content, and authorization helpers, integrating mixins for access control and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding a new privacyPolicy terms type and returning an empty upgraded termsContent map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing implemented legal text publishing, privacy policy UI, and admin editing features with associated files and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files covering routing, UI components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Empty or placeholder CSS file for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with a root div and main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup managing authentication, profile setup, PIN/biometric flows, and routing including the privacy policy page.
frontend/src/components/admin/TermsManag: Admin panel for viewing, editing, and publishing customer terms, store owner terms, and privacy policy content.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Component showing an access denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/BiometricEn: Dialog for enabling biometric authentication, handling setup flow and errors with UI buttons.
frontend/src/components/auth/PinSetupDia: Dialog guiding users through creating and confirming a 4‑digit PIN and saving it locally.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Profile creation form collecting user details, role selection, and submitting via mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnlockDialo: Unlock dialog that attempts biometric auth first, falling back to PIN verification.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation links by role, header, mobile menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Context provider managing theme state, persistence, and resolving system theme preference.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button toggling between light and dark themes using ThemeProvider state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor based on identity and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBiometricAuth.ts: Implements WebAuthn-based biometric enablement and verification with local credential storage and processing state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalPin.ts: Implements a local PIN system with simple hashing, unlock session management, and state syncing via storage events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods such as user profiles, stores, terms, and other domain operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS with custom light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/legal/providedLegalText.ts: Contains static legal text strings for customer and store-owner terms used in the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Dashboard displaying counts for stores, customers, orders, revenue, and analytics with controls to block or unblock stores.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RoleLoginPage.ts: Role-based login page using Internet Identity that redirects authenticated users to their respective dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CartPage.tsx: Customer cart interface allowing quantity changes, item removal, and navigation back to stores or checkout.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CheckoutPage: Checkout flow that collects order details, handles biometrics or PIN confirmation, and submits orders to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerDash: Customer dashboard offering quick navigation to store access, search, marketplace, cart, and order history.
frontend/src/pages/customer/MarketplaceP: Marketplace listing products with search, category filtering, sorting, and the ability to add items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrderDetailP: Displays details of a specific customer order, including items, store info, status badge, and navigation back to order list.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Lists a user's active and completed orders with status badges and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreAccessP: Provides a form for entering a store ID and navigating to that store's detail page.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreDetailP: Shows store information, products, reviews, and allows adding items to the cart with availability checks.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreSearchP: Allows users to search and filter stores by name and category, displaying results with navigation to each store.
frontend/src/pages/owner/InventoryPage.t: Enables store owners to view, create, edit, and delete products with image uploads, stock management, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OrdersManagemen: Displays and manages store orders with status updates and categorized views.
Shows the store owner's dashboard with store listings and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreRegistrati: Provides a form for registering a new store and submitting its details.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreSettingsPa: Allows editing and updating an existing store's information.
frontend/src/pages/terms/PrivacyPolicyPa: Fetches and displays the privacy policy content with a scrollable view.
frontend/src/pages/terms/TermsAcceptance: Displays terms content and handles user acceptance before redirecting.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing cart items by store with add, remove, update, clear, and total calculation logic, persisted under 'primepost-cart'.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Provides functions to aggregate orders into daily, weekly, and monthly revenue and count statistics.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting prices and computing effective and line totals with optional discounts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/userProfile.ts: Functions to derive a display name and initials from a user profile.
frontend/src/utils/webauthn.ts: WebAuthn helpers to check availability and create or retrieve platform credentials with proper error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing PrimePost’s architecture, requirements, existing features, and known issues.
